title: Hint
text:
$$1$$. Identify the polynomial and divisor:
The polynomial is f(x) $$=$$ x⁴ - 9x² + $$14$$, and the divisor is (x - 2).

$$2$$. Apply the Remainder Theorem:
The Remainder Theorem states that the remainder of f(x) when divided by (x - a) is simply f(a).
Here, a $$=$$ $$2$$.

$$3$$. Evaluate f(2):
f(2) $$=$$ (2)⁴ - 9(2)² + $$14$$
...
